overview: Oscar, a 28-year-old "reveler", lives his life "on credit", without thinking about the future, trading in petty fraud and scams, spending money on girls, drugs and booze. But one day, gangster creditors give him an ultimatum to repay his debts before the end of the day. Now the debtor needs to find a huge amount of money in a few hours to pay off all debts.
title: Debtor
